name: Canongate Edinburgh - Old Town Royal Style!
description:
I
will take you on a fascinating journey through Canongate. The most fascinating
part of the Old Town of Edinburgh. This was the home patch of the Scottish
monarchy and their courtiers. The story begins in the 12th century
and continues for many more. Let me show you buildings dating right from the
beginning. What part did monks play in the beginning? I will make your
imagination sparkle with tails of fascinating royal intrigue.
